title: algorithm
description: the type of algorithm used by the computing task

algorithm_name.description: the case-sensitive common name of the algorithm, example: RandomForest, SVM, XGBoost...

framework.description: the common name of the software framework implementing the algorithm, if any

frameworkVersion.description: the version of the software framework implementing the algorithm, if any

classPath.description: the full class path of the algorithm within the framework, with elements separated by dots

tuning_method.description: the method of hyper-parameters tuning used (if any), example : GridSearch, RandomizedSearch...

hyperparameter_name.description: the name of the hyperparameter, example : C, kernel, gamma, class_weight...

hyperparameter_value.description: the value of the hyperparameter, example : rbf, 1e-4, 10, linear...

quantization.description: the data weights (in bits) obtained thanks to the quantization, example : 2, 8, 16...

quantizification_method.description: the full class path of the algorithm within the framework, with elements separated by dots
